document_data.name: Edik Brey
document_data.home: [[Peytir Timber]], [[Mulmaster]]{{Cite adventurers league/Black Heart of Vengeance|34}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Edik Brey''' (pronounced ''ED-ick BRAY'') was a foreman in [[Mulmaster]].{{Cite adventurers league/Black Heart of Vengeance|14-15}}
document_data.History: Edik was a foreman retainer of [[House Peytir]]. He worked as manager at [[Peytir Timber]] until, in [[1491 DR]], a strange quake destroyed it and his employers disappeared.
document_data.Personality: Edik was fiercely loyal to the Peytir family and was a natural leader. He truly cared about his job and the men and women who worked for him. He had a need for action and was anxious about the disappearance of his workers.{{Cite adventurers league/Black Heart of Vengeance|15}}
